item.description:
Come join us in a sound meditation concert with Planetary Gongs & Tibetan singing bowls.
The gongs and singing bowls will help you reach a state of deep relaxation and take you on a sound journey to help you retune and rebalance.

Mind body soul wellness is something we donâ€™t always make time for in our crazy multitasking lifestyles. Cost $20 for the hour session, cash only. The chapter will pay $5 toward the cost for each member so it will cost members $15. Guests are welcome. Come in comfortable clothes and open mind.

RSVP by August 4. Contact Abdul Musa, Abdul@growurbiz.com with questions.
item.how_to_find_us: this studio is the first door on the left, in the plaza next to McDonalds.
item.name: Meditation Night
